content: add rich color to your baby s world with this interesting crochet blanket designed using bernat baby blanket calico this advanced pattern will keep you engaged with a variety of techniques like double_crochet double_crochet back post double_crochet front post and more the ridged pattern gives the fabric added flair as it drapes over the crib or nursing chair choose your own color and make this sweet and squishy blanket to warm up the nursery or playroom materials bernat® baby blanket™ calico 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m sunset 04927 3 balls or 545 yds/498 m
